scripts.postinstall: cd node_modules/dropbox && npm install && npm run build:cjs
scripts.start: concurrently -n api-server,api-lambda,api-shared,shared "yarn start:api-server" "yarn start:api-lambda" "yarn start:api-shared" "yarn start:shared"
scripts.deploy-server: pm2 stop oboku-api && git fetch origin && git reset --hard origin/release && yarn && pm2 start oboku-api && pm2 log oboku-api
